species.name: conkeldurr
descriptions: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
They use concrete pillars as walking canes. They know moves that enable them to swing the pillars freely in battle.
When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

abilities.name: sheer-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

abilities.name: iron-fist
abilities.effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.
